params.name: date
params.desc: The date to check if it is in busniness hours. If not provided, it evaluates the current date. All dates are evaluated Eastern Time.

params.name: year
params.desc: The calendar year you want to check if it is a leap year. If not provided, it evaluates the current year.

params.name: monthOfYear
params.desc: The calendar month you want to check if it is currently. E.g., January, February, Jan, Feb.

params.name: dayOfWeek
params.desc: The day of week. E.g., Monday, Tuesday, Mon, Tue.

params.name: date
params.desc: The date in which you want to check if it is a US Holiday. If not provided, it evaluates the current day. All dates are evaluated as Eastern Time.

params.name: latLong
params.desc: The latitude and longitude of the geographic location you want to know whether or not it is raining. Must be comma separated. E.g., 41.0842, -81.5141

params.name: latLong
params.desc: The latitude and longitude of the geographic location you want to know whether or not it is raining in the next hour. Must be comma separated. E.g., 41.0842, -81.5141

params.name: intensity
params.desc: The intensity of rain you want to know if it is raining at currently. Valid values are: light, moderate, heavy.

params.name: latLong
params.desc: The latitude and longitude of the geographic location you want to know whether or not it is raining. Must be comma separated. E.g., 41.0842, -81.5141
